items_data.name: potion
items_data.description: Restores 200 HP of one character.
items_data.effect: Restores 200 HP of one target. Damages zombies.

items_data.name: hi-potion
items_data.description: Restores 1000 HP of one character.
items_data.effect: Restores 1000 HP of one target. Damages zombies.

items_data.name: x-potion
items_data.description: Fully restores HP of one character.
items_data.effect: Fully restores HP of one target (maximum of 9,999 HP). zamages Zombies.

items_data.name: mega-potion
items_data.description: Restores 2000 HP of each party member.
items_data.effect: Restores 2000 HP of target party. Damages Zombies.

items_data.name: ether
items_data.description: Restores 100 MP of one character.
items_data.effect: Restores 100 MP of one target. Lowers MP of zombies.

items_data.name: turbo ether
items_data.description: Restores 500 MP of one character.
items_data.effect: Restores 500 MP of one target. Lowers MP of zombies.

items_data.name: elixir
items_data.description: Fully restores one character's HP & MP.
items_data.effect: Fully restores HP & MP of one target (maximum of 9,999 HP and 999 MP). Damages zombies.

items_data.name: megalixir
items_data.description: Fully restores HP & MP of party.
items_data.effect: Fully restores HP & MP of target party (maximum of 9,999 HP and 999 MP). Damages zombies.

items_data.name: phoenix down
items_data.description: Revives one character from KO.
items_data.effect: Revives one character from KO with half of their max HP (maximum of 9,999 HP). Damages zombies and instant KO's them, if they're not immune to life.

items_data.name: mega phoenix
items_data.description: Revives party from KO.
items_data.effect: Revives party from KO and fully restores HP of revived characters (maximum of 9,999 HP). Damages zombies and instant KO's them, if they're not immune to life.

items_data.name: remedy
items_data.description: Cures all status abnormalities.
items_data.effect: Cures all status ailments of one target, except breaks, curse, doom, and KO.

items_data.effect: Makes one enemy drop Power Spheres. The amount dropped equals the amount of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

items_data.effect: Makes one enemy drop Speed Spheres. The amount dropped equals the amount of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

items_data.name: ability distiller

items_data.effect: Makes one enemy drop Ability Spheres. The amount dropped equals the amount of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

items_data.description: Changes current location on Sphere Grid.

items_data.name: warp sphere
